document.full_text: south korea's k.j choi beat american david toms in a sudden-death playoff to win the players championship at sawgrass sunday and become the first asian to win golf's unofficial "fifth major."
document.title: choi wins players as toms' touch goes at the end
lines_and_colors: south korea's k.j choi beat american david toms in a sudden-death playoff to win the players championship at sawgrass sunday and become the first asian to win golf's unofficial "fifth major."
